short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show or hide jupyter notebook code when pressing on the extension icon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Very simple extension that hides or shows all the python code inside a jupyter notebook tab when the extension icon (in the extension bar) is clicked.

• v.1.0.6 - Made it compatible with latest jupyter version
• v.1.0.5 - Fixed another padding issue in the "print preview" page (this time for the text).
• v.1.0.4 - Fixed image padding issues in the "print preview" page.
• v.1.0.3 - Fixed permission bug that didn't allow to use the extension in the "print preview" page.
• v.1.0.2 - Fixed code cell with no output not being fully hidden (still selectable).
• v.1.0.1 - Updated in order to work also when in "print preview" mode.
